How to use? Step 1 Tap on WhatsApp icon. Step 2 Click to open Whatsapp or WA Business button. Step 3 First you have to see Status from Whatsapp or WA Business. Step 4 Once you seen status in Whatsapp or WA Business then open this application and Pull Down to refresh status, Your seen status will be here in this app and from here you can Download and Share. Status not available.
Click on this button and Allow permission to access your status Allow storage access Send Enter your message Enter mobile number Select country and Enter Mobile Number.
Saved to downloads folder Tap to open Saved as %s
Welcome!!! This app allows you to save Whatsapp and Whatsapp business status, recover deleted message by reading your notifications and also too many amazing other features How app works? After viewing status from whatsapp/whatsapp business you can view all status on this app and you can download that also and After receiving the message with notification, this app recovers the message that the user has deleted/not deleted as well User guide To get status you must have to view on whatsapp/whatsapp business app after that you can see and download status from this app and This app can\'t recover message which not appear on notification and also messages that have been deleted before you installed this app! Setup Allow Permissions Multimedia or Storage Access(1/2) Allow to access photos, video etc.. Allow Read Notifications Access(2/2) Allow to read or backup your message from notifications
